title: About the Art of War
description: "About the Art of War" is the advanced military book written by the renaissance genius Niccolo Machiavelli. Considered one of the best books ever written about military strategy, in it the famous author describes how to organize and prepare for war providing examples from several armies and successful generals of all time. The book is regarded as one of the main pillars of military science of all times.
